title: Beautiful small townhouse
posting_body: Small but cozy townhouse located in a very desirable location.
The apt is a "town house" style apartment attached to a small 2 unit building, adding a touch of privacy as there are no tenants below or above this unit.
The unit consists of two floors, kitchen and living room is located on the first floor.
Bedroom and bathroom is located on the second floor.
This is a small apartment but with a spacious bedroom with large closet.
The total unit square footage is around 550 square feet.
This unit is steps from East Boston but without the East Boston price tag.
The unit has the following features: 2 floors of living space.
Spiral stairs.
Large front porch with ocean views.
Hardwood floors throughout.
Plenty of closet and storage space..
New energy efficiency gas heater system.
Recessed lighting in the bedroom.
Direct private entrance to the bedroom.
Stand up shower.
The new silver line station is a 10 minute walk from the apartment.
The silver line station has direct access to Logan Airport, South Station and the Boston Waterfront (seaport)
The 111 bus with direct access to Hay Market square is only a few minutes walk.
Easy access to East Boston, Somerville, Cambridge and Everett.
The rent is $1,950 PLUS utilities.
First, last and sec deposit required.
Good landlord references is a MUST.
Section 8 applicants with good references accepted.
There are beautiful, ocean, marina and Boston skyline view from the bedroom windows.
